segment.source: Validate UE-V Settings Location Templates with UE-V Generator
segment.target: Validate UE-V Settings Location Templates with UE-V Generator

segment.source: Validate UE-V Settings Location Templates with UE-V Generator
segment.target: Validate UE-V Settings Location Templates with UE-V Generator

segment.source: Validate UE-V Settings Location Templates with UE-V Generator
segment.target: Validate UE-V Settings Location Templates with UE-V Generator

segment.source: It is possible to create or edit settings locations templates in an XML editor without using the UE-V Generator.
segment.target: It is possible to create or edit settings locations templates in an XML editor without using the UE-V Generator.

segment.source: If you do so, you can use the UE-V Generator to validate that the new or revised XML matches the schema that has been defined for the template.
segment.target: If you do so, you can use the UE-V Generator to validate that the new or revised XML matches the schema that has been defined for the template.

segment.source: To validate a UE-V settings location template with the UE-V Generator
segment.target: To validate a UE-V settings location template with the UE-V Generator

segment.source: Click Start, and then point to All Programs.
segment.target: Click Start, and then point to All Programs.

segment.source: Point to Microsoft User Experience Virtualization, and then click Microsoft User Experience Virtualization Generator.
segment.target: Point to Microsoft User Experience Virtualization, and then click Microsoft User Experience Virtualization Generator.

segment.source: Click Validate a settings location template.
segment.target: Click Validate a settings location template.

segment.source: In the list of recently used templates, select the template to be edited.
segment.target: In the list of recently used templates, select the template to be edited.

segment.source: Alternatively, you can Browse to the settings template file.
segment.target: Alternatively, you can Browse to the settings template file.

segment.source: Click Next to continue.
segment.target: Click Next to continue.

segment.source: Click Validate to continue.
segment.target: Click Validate to continue.

segment.source: Click Close to close the Settings Template Wizard.
segment.target: Click Close to close the Settings Template Wizard.

segment.source: Exit the UE-V Generator application.
segment.target: Exit the UE-V Generator application.

segment.source: After you validate the settings location template for an application, you should test the template.
segment.target: After you validate the settings location template for an application, you should test the template.

segment.source: Deploy the template in a lab environment before you put it into production in the enterprise.
segment.target: Deploy the template in a lab environment before you put it into production in the enterprise.
